Today on the Dingle Peninsula, surf is looking solid at 6 ft @ 8s NW with a moderate 12 mph WNW wind. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both offering fun waves throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 5 ft @ 9s WNW and light 6 mph SSW winds, making for a clean session at the same spots. However, the day after brings 8 ft @ 9s W with fresh 27 mph WNW winds, likely making it blown out and challenging. Best: tomorrow.
